luas.exoplanet.transit_functions.transit_light_curve(mfp: Any, x_t: ndarray | Array) → ndarray | Array¶
luas.exoplanet.transit_functions.transit_light_curve_vmap(mfp: Any, x_t: ndarray | Array) → ndarray | Array¶

Vectorized version of transit_light_curve. Takes similar arguments as transit_light_curve but with additional array axes over which transit_light_curve is mapped.
